main_definition: A defendant is an individual or entity accused of committing a crime in a court of law.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In criminal proceedings, a person who has been charged with a crime and stands trial
meanings_and_examples.example: John was arrested as the defendant in a burglary case.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A legal party accused or sued in court
meanings_and_examples.example: The company became the defendant in a lawsuit over patent infringement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An individual who denies allegations made against them and enters into legal defense
meanings_and_examples.example: When accused of embezzlement, Sarah became her own defendant by hiring an attorney to defend her.
